Hello

My name is Silvio Paganini and I write code.
I like science, blockchain, astronomy, cosmology, maths, snowboard, food and travelling.
One day I will disappear and be a travel blogger or a snowboarder (ok, maybe not).

I'm the Co-Founder of FLUUUID and CTO/Principal Developer of Woala,
curator of codedoodl.es, part of TheFWA Judging panel and moderator of DevCon.London.
Sometimes I write articles on Medium and blog inspirational art.

In the past 17 years, I've worked for Pigzbe.com, YOOX Net-a-Porter, Stinkdigital, Nexus Interactive Arts, Jam3,
North Kingdom, UNIT9, Hi-ReS!, R/GA, Isobar Nowlab, Sapient Nitro, Blast Radius, Agency Republic, Bleed,
GyroHSR, EURO RSCG, Publicis, JWT and Rapp Digital.

Get in touch. I'm available for freelance work and art project collaboration,
or just up for a good chat over coffee/beer/wine/__put-here-your-fav-drink__

Too shy to get in touch? Then download my boring Resum√© or stalk my Linkedin.

Like to spam? email me.
